message: Let's start with a fair-ish split.  I'm willing to give you a thousand to get this going.  Hope you'll accept!
Let's split it 60-40. I think it's a fair deal considering the inflation!
I'm willing to compromise a bit more, but I still think a 55/45 split is fair considering the inflation is hurting you more than me.  Let's finish this already!
Considering the inflation, I need a bigger share. 58-42 is my final offer.
